name: Escape from Castle Coolname
description:
Escape from Castle Coolname was a short first person game project completed as part of my Game Design university degree.  Uploading here so that a playable version can be included in my portfolio for those interested, though anyone else who wants to play it is welcome to do so.

The idea behind the subject was to create a short narrative sequence (less then 5 minutes) that allowed the player to interact with at least 3 distinct mechanics, to teach the design of interactable objects and mechanics.
